sentences.sContent: He reached up to loosen the scarf around his neck.
sentences.sCn: 他伸出手松开围在脖子上的围巾。

synos.tran: [服装]围巾；嵌接，嵌接处；头巾领巾

remMethod.val: 为了遮住脖子上的伤疤(scar)， 围了条围巾(scarf)

trans.tranCn: 围巾， 披巾， 头巾
trans.tranOther: a piece of cloth that you wear around your neck, head, or shoulders, especially to keep warm
